channel.title: Projects on Chad Lucas
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Chad Lucas

item.title: Console Project
item.description: This project is a work in progress. Here are an unorganized list of potential improvements to the Linux terminal environment. PRESENTATION It might be that there are two or three different applications that are being described here. If this is the case they need to be broken up and tackled one at a time. Question: How will this be presented? As an application or as a “layer” for which a shell is running while the application is running?
